user.title: Select installation type
user.description: The remote node is the instance on which the states are gathered from

error.unsupported_version: Unsupported version. At least version 0.111 is required.
error.missing_endpoint: You need to install Remote Home Assistant on this host and add remote_homeassistant: to its configuration.

init.title: Basic Options (step 1/4)
init.description: Configure prefixes and select services to proxy. The dropdown lists support search - just start typing to filter options.

data_description.load_components: Select domains to load. Type to search through {components_count} available domains.
data_description.services: Select services to proxy from remote. Type to search through {services_count} available services.

domain_entity_filters.title: Domain and entity filters (step 2/4)
domain_entity_filters.description: Select which domains and entities to include or exclude. All dropdowns support search - type to filter the lists. Found {total_domains} domains with {total_entities} entities.

data_description.include_domains: Include all entities from selected domains
data_description.exclude_domains: Exclude all entities from selected domains

general_filters.title: Filters (step 3/4)
general_filters.description:
Add a new filter by specifying `Entity ID`, one or more filter attributes and press `Submit`. Remove existing filters by unticking them in `Filters`.

Leave `Entity ID` empty and press `Submit` to make no further changes.

events.title: Subscribed events (step 4/4)
events.description: Select events to subscribe to from the dropdown (supports search). You can also type custom event names. Currently tracking {events_count} events.

data_description.subscribe_events: Select or type event names to subscribe to
data_description.add_new_event: Enter a custom event name to add to the list

abort.not_supported: No configuration options supported for a remote node
